scripts.setup: npm install && npm run git-setup && npm run start-app
scripts.git-setup: if not exist .git (git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/kyan0045/catchtwo.git)
scripts.start-app: git fetch origin && git checkout -B v1.4-beta origin/v1.4-beta && git pull origin v1.4-beta && node --no-deprecation index.js
